sense.def:
To resign from a job or position
pomeni uradno objaviti, da odhajamo z delovnega mesta ali položaja.

seg.quote: Lloyd George was threatening to resign.

sense.def:
To resign oneself to an unpleasant situation or fact
pomeni sprejeti neprijeten položaj ali dejstvo, ker ga ne moremo spremeniti.

seg.quote: You're a widow now, Mrs Pearl. I think you must resign yourself to that fact.
